item.description:
Gain some great ways to increase harmony and balance into your life.  Discover how to attract love, wealth, health, etc.

What the Heck is Feng Shui and does it really work?

Good question! People use Feng Shui everyday by decorating their home and they just don't know it. They use their gut feeling on how to decorate a room and what items they want to use. It 'feels' good to them or does it really? Come learn the a few basic things you can do to your living area to start a change in the right direction. Feng Shui by Angel will discuss the basics of Feng Shui and simple steps you can take home with you to start to bring balance and harmony to your living environment. 

 

Check out Angel's blog and website here...

No charge for this event.

Time: 10 am - 12 pm

Meet in the event room in the back of the store. Food and beverage from the cafe is allowed in the event room, so feel free to grab a cup of coffee or tea and bring it on in.
item.how_to_find_us: Event room in back of store.
item.name: Feng Shui Seminar
